Smart Card: An Introduction to smart card development

  • Ali N. Parizi
  • 24 September 2022
  • blog hardware iot device crypto-graphic smart-card

Variational AutoEncoders are very popular extention of autoencoders which try to map the input data into a probablistic distribution of the data in latent space instead of learning a direc representation. This article is a straightforward walkthrough to get familiar with Variational AutoEncoders.
